Hi im a newb here but this game works on my psp-2000 flawlessly i just updated my gen-d3 to gen-prometheus 2 at first my game stops after i go to sleep in the game but after I updated to prom-2,have no problem since hope this helps!!

Oh man! That Prom-2 CFW didn't stop the Sleep issue afterall!:( Still black screen when sleeping. It's only happening on the current mission I beat twice now and had to turn the game off after both times because of the error, so maybe it has something to do WITH that mission? Or maybe the problem only actually happens if you choose to Install the data? Come to think of it, I only started having the problems after then! I'll try deleting the installed data and report in after.

Yes, I deleted the install data for the game (a hefty ~450MB) and I haven't encountered the Sleep issue again yet!=) I'll let you know if it comes back afterall. I never noticed a difference in the speed of the game or anything else between having the data installed or not, so no need

Thanks for the upload

Guys, could you take a minute to complete this survey: bit*ly/GLFront (replace * with .)? It's part of the Gallian Liberation Front campaign to persuade 3rd-party publishers to localize Valkyria Chronicles 3 and the goal to provide a statistics of the fanbase to these publishers.
